root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 8-b-1, translated into en
root.data: Objective 8. Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all8.b By 2020, develop and implement a global strategy for youth employment and implement the International Labor Organization's Global Jobs Pact8.b.1 Existence of a national strategy for the promotion of youth employment, whether it is a strategy in its own right or a component of a national strategy for the promotion of employment, and application of this strategyTier IIIcategory IIICategory III
